meta_text: ("BSHAD PHAL MO CHE'I ZIN BRIS SKAL LDAN SPYI NOR_A Jewel for All Those with the Goodness to Hear It— Notes on the Majority of a Teaching granted by the Great Holder of the Diamond, His Holiness the Panchen Lama, King of the Dharma, the High and Holy Lobsang Pelden Yeshe, Good and Glorious One, in the Midst of a Great Assembly at the Main Hall of the Great Monastery of Trashi Hlunpo, in the Form of an Extensive Dissection Instruction on the ‘Hundred Rituals for Offering the Torma Cake’_PAN CHEN BLA MA SKU PHRENG GSUM PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES (1738-1780)", 'rtf')
title_tib: RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO 7PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG POS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I TSOGS CHEN 'DUS SDE CHEN PO'I DBUS SU GTOR MA BRGYA RTZA'I DMAR KHRID RGYAS PAR STZAL SKABS, GSUNG
